page.title: 13EVENTS IN MORFA BYCHAN
page.content: The Women's Institute organise a Welsh Evening during August at the Ganolfan (Community Centre). The President compares the event, explaining the authenticity of the Welsh costume she and the singers are wearing. A local harpist and her pupil provide the entertainment together with two young singers who have won recognition at both local and national eisteddfodau. The event is popular with residents and tourists alike. Tea,Welsh cakes and bara brith (fruit loaf) are provided and local crafts are on sale.
